DOCNAME: CASE OF OTYCHENKO AND FEDISHCHENKO v. UKRAINE
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial
JUDGES: Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Stanislav Shevchuk;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and currently lives in LOC , GPE , GPE .

CARDINAL . At the material time she worked at ORG “ LOC ” ( Управління житлово-комунального господарства « Котельниково GPE ) , a municipal enterprise set up and owned by local village council . The labour contract with the applicant was signed by that village council . Subsequently she resigned .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of GPE awarded the applicant CARDINAL NORP hryvnias ( ORG ) in salary arrears and other payments due to her by her former employer .

CARDINAL . This judgment became final and on DATE ORG instituted proceedings to enforce it . According to the Government , in the course of these proceedings the total amount of ORG DATE was paid to the applicant . The applicant , in her turn , contested that she had ever been paid any sum under the judgment .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted another set of proceedings against her former employer seeking additional compensation for salary arrears . On DATE the court dismissed her claim . The applicant did not appeal against this judgment .

CARDINAL . On DATE the enforcement proceedings were terminated for lack of funds of the debtor enterprise . The applicant did not challenge this decision before the domestic courts ; nor had she reintroduced her writ of enforcement with ORG .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of GPE initiated liquidation proceedings against the debtor enterprise . These proceedings were terminated on DATE and the enterprise was removed from the relevant enterprises’ register . The applicant did not raise her creditor claims within these proceedings .
CARDINAL . The judgment of DATE remains unenforced .
CARDINAL . NORP The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE , the GPE region , GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE ORG awarded the applicant ORG DATE and ORG CARDINAL , respectively , in salary arrears due to her by her former employer , ORG ( Комунальне підприємство водопровідно-каналізаційного господарства в м. П’ятихатки ) set up , owned and managed by local town council .
CARDINAL . These judgments became final and on DATE and DATE , respectively , ORG instituted proceedings to enforce them .
CARDINAL . The applicant complained to various ORG authorities about lengthy non - enforcement of the judgments in her favour but to no avail .
CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE the awarded amounts were paid to the applicant .

CARDINAL . The general provisions of domestic legislation on enforcement of judicial decisions are set out in the judgment of CARDINAL July CARDINAL in the case of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § CARDINAL ) .

CARDINAL . The provisions of LAW of DATE ( repealed on DATE ) and LAW of DATE ( in force since DATE ) on owner ’s liability for the obligations of its legal entity are set out in the case of GPE and Others v. GPE , nos . CARDINAL/CARDINAL and foll . , § § DATE , ORG CARDINALXII ) .
